description: This trap is sent each time a threshold on a PM condition
on an EoMpls Pw is crossed.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdCrossingAlert F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdIndex i 9999 F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdInterval i 1 F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdVariable o 1.3.6.1.4.1.8072.2.1.1 F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdValueLo u 9999 F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdValueHi u 9999 F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdMonValue C 9999

description: An index that uniquely identifies an entry in the
variables.name: F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdIndex

description: The interval over which monitored value is
sampled and compared with the specified threshold.
variables.name: F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdInterval

description: The object identifier of the particular variable to be
variables.name: F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdVariable

description: Lower 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdValueLo

description: Higher 32 bits of the threshold value.
variables.name: F3-EOMPLS-MIB::f3EoMplsPwThresholdValueHi
